code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with 4 weeks history of worsening mild feelings of terror in social situations, mild long standing inability to ride on elevators due to overwhelming fear accompanied by palpitations, diaphoresis and dyspnea and Mental Health. he is a 25 yr old white m school superintendent. o:Height 73 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:patient presents with mild long standing inability to ride on elevators due to overwhelming fear accompanied by palpitations, diaphoresis and dyspnea for 7 weeks. patient also reports mild feelings of terror in social situations. he is a 26 YO white M. he denies ever using cigarettes occasional EtOH o:Height 72 in, Weight 154 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.
